name: Hare Will Be Blood
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/hare-will-be-blood

~~~~BUG IN GAME IS CAUSING EVERYTHING TO DRAIN FASTER. WILL RE-UPLOAD ONCE RESOLVED~~~~

WASD - movement  / E - interact with items

Left click portrait to change characters

Space/Left Click to shoot

Certain items can only be interacted with certain characters. Try to figure out who does what and attempt to survive until spring!

  • Health - Red (Lose all of this and your character dies)
  •  Stamina - Green (No energy prevents most item interactions)
  • Hunger - Blue  (Go hungry and start starving to death)

Better Description and Instructions to follow (i.e. in game).
